author: The Linux Foundation
description:
🤖 What if AI agents were as easy to build as microservices?
🧠 What does Meta’s latest AI chip test reveal about the RISC-V ecosystem?
⚡ How does AI meet infrastructure in the energy sector?
📦 EdgeX quietly dropped a release that could change industrial IoT.
🐍 Python’s playing a new role at the edge—did you catch it?

📺 We unpack all of it in just 60 seconds. Watch this week’s LF Quick Hits.
title: 🌍 From the edge to the energy grid to your next LLM project, open source is accelerating fast this
